channel.title: Plz help my first script

item.title: Plz help my first script
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I was bored and I made it sexy for you. I added a Functionc alled MyFC which shortenedyour code a little

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// Powerminer ///
/// By Uncle James ///
/// Instructions ///
/// + make sure you add all the colours ///
/// + mini-map facing north ///
/// + U must look from above in ///
/// + V-bright, 32bit colors ///
/// + U Need Scar version 2.0.3 ///
/// + start in any mine, any where ///
/// + make sure silent mouse is off ///
/// + make sure the server is low-detail ///
/// ///
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Program PowerMiner;

Var DropColor, x, y : Integer;

Const
     (*==========Colors On Main Screen==========*)
     Ore1   = 536912; // color of first rock to mine
     Ore2   = 536912; // color of second rock to mine
     Ore3   = 536912; // color of third rock to mine
     Invore = 3966956; // color of rock in inventory

Function MyFC(bitmap : Integer): Boolean;
Begin
     FindColor(x, y, bitmap, 201, 113, 327, 220);
End;

Procedure MineRocks;
Begin
     If MyFC(ore1) or MyFC(ore2) or MyFC(ore3) Then
     Begin
          Wait(Random(50)+500);
          MoveMouseSmooth(x, y);
          Wait(Random(50)+100);
     End;
     If MyFC(ore1) or MyFC(ore2) or MyFC(ore3) Then
     Begin
          ClickMouse(x, y, true);
          Wait(random(1000)+5000);
          Wait(2000);
     End;
End;

Procedure DropOre;
Begin
     If FindColor(x, y, Invore, 699, 424, 742, 426) Then
     Begin
          MoveMouseSmooth(x,y);
          Wait(Random(50)+500);
          DropColor(invore)
     End;
End.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help my first script
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Thats because dropcolor isn’t a procedure.

If you wanted it to drop all items with an invetnroy color, make a procedure to get rid of everything with a spefic color.

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help my first script
item.dc:creator: @macrominer macrominer
item.description:
@macrominer wrote:

ty…but i got a new problem lol… heres the new script…
Line 55: [Error] (55:10): Type mismatch in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\powerminer.scar

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// Powerminer ///
/// By Uncle James ///
/// Instructions ///
/// + make sure you add all the colours ///
/// + mini-map facing north ///
/// + U must look from above in ///
/// + V-bright, 32bit colors ///
/// + U Need Scar version 2.0.3 ///
/// + start in any mine, any where ///
/// + make sure silent mouse is off ///
/// + make sure the server is low-detail ///
/// ///
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program powerminer;
var dropcolor, x,y:integer;
const
(==========Colors On Main Screen==========)
ore1= 536912; // color of first rock to mine
ore2= 536912; // color of second rock to mine
ore3= 536912; // color of third rock to mine
invore= 3966956; // color of rock in inventory

procedure minerocks;
begin
if
findcolor(x,y,ore1,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore2,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore3,201,113,327,220)
then
wait(random(50)+500)
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(random(50)+100)
if
findcolor(x,y,ore1,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore2,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore3,201,113,327,220)
then
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(random(1000)+5000)
sleep(2000)
end;

procedure dropore;
begin
if
findcolor (x,y,invore,699, 424, 742, 426)
then
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(random(50)+500)
dropcolor(invore) this is line 55
end.

item.title: Plz help my first script
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

You never declared the variables x, and y as a boolean, integer, or string.

program GuildMiner; var x,y:integer; //Declares the variables as integers (numbers.) const *********************this is line 17**************************

There you go, just change it to that!

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help my first script
item.dc:creator: @macrominer macrominer
item.description:
@macrominer wrote:

hi, this is my first power miner, its not finished yet, but it says…Line 17: [Error] (17:1): Identifier expected in script C:\Documents and Settings\James Thompson\My Documents\power miner.scar
heres the sctipt…ive pointed out line 17…plz tell me what i need to do to fix this problem
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// Powerminer ///
/// By Uncle James ///
/// Instructions ///
/// + make sure you add all the colours ///
/// + mini-map facing north ///
/// + U must look from above in ///
/// + V-bright, 32bit colors ///
/// + U Need Scar version 2.0.3 ///
/// + start in any mine, any where ///
/// + make sure silent mouse is off ///
/// + make sure the server is low-detail ///
/// ///
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program GuildMiner;
var x,y:
const this is line 17*****
(==========Colors On Main Screen==========)
ore1= 536912; // color of first rock to mine
ore2= 536912; // color of second rock to mine
ore3= 536912; // color of third rock to mine
invore= 3966956; // color of rock in inventory

procedure minerocks;
begin
if
findcolor(x,y,ore1,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore2,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore3,201,113,327,220)
then
wait(random(50)+500)
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(random(50)+100)
if
findcolor(x,y,ore1,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore2,201,113,327,220)
or
findcolor(x,y,ore3,201,113,327,220)
then
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(random(1000)+5000)
sleep(2000)
end;

procedure dropore;
begin
if
findcolor (a,b,invore,699, 424, 742, 426)
then
MoveMouseSmooth(a,b)
wait(random(50)+500)
dropcolor(invore)
end;
